```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(brms)
library(patchwork)
library(rstatix)
```

```{r}
vocab <- read_csv("files/vocab.csv")
grammar <- read_csv("files/grammar.csv")
complete <- left_join(grammar, vocab, by="data_id")
complete <- complete %>%
  filter(!is.na(Total_Vocab))
```


```{r}
m1 <- brm(M1_F | mi(M1_SE) ~ Vocab_F*age, data=complete, save_mevars = TRUE, file="bayes_models_test/m1.rds")
summary(m1)
```

```{r}
hypothesis(m1, "Vocab_F:age > 0")
```
